put.summary: Actions on a vendor software product
put.description: Performs one of the following actions on a vendor software product: |Checkout: Locks it for edits by other users. Only the locking user sees the edited version.|Undo_Checkout: Unlocks it and deletes the edits that were done.|Checkin: Unlocks it and activates the edited version to all users.| Submit: Finalize its active version.|Create_Package: Creates a CSAR zip file.|

post.summary: Actions on a action
post.description: Performs one of the following actions on a action: |Checkout: Locks it for edits by other users.
